attributeName	attributeDefinition	class	unit	dateTimeFormatString	missingValueCode	missingValueCodeExplanation
taxon_id	Identifier assigned to each unique organism.	character			NA	Not available
taxon_rank	Taxonomic rank of the organism.	character			NA	Not available
taxon_name	Taxonomic name of the organism.	character			NA	Not available
authority_system	Name of the system assigning the authority_taxon_id.	character			NA	Not available
authority_taxon_id	Identifier in the authority system corresponding to the taxon_name.	character			NA	Not available
